# TASK::DOES_SCENARIO_GROUP_EXIST

## Summary
Check if a named scenario group exists

## Parameters
* **STRING** scenarioGroupName: Is the name of a scenario group, which may or may not exist.

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns TRUE if the group exists.

Full list of scenario groups used in scripts by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/scenarioGroupNames.json
Occurrences in the b617d scripts:

"ARMY_GUARD",
"ARMY_HELI",
"Cinema_Downtown",
"Cinema_Morningwood",
"Cinema_Textile",
"City_Banks",
"Countryside_Banks",
"DEALERSHIP",
"GRAPESEED_PLANES",
"KORTZ_SECURITY",
"LOST_BIKERS",
"LSA_Planes",
"LSA_Planes",
"MP_POLICE",
"Observatory_Bikers",
"POLICE_POUND1",
"POLICE_POUND2",
"POLICE_POUND3",
"POLICE_POUND4",
"POLICE_POUND5"
"QUARRY",
"SANDY_PLANES",
"SCRAP_SECURITY",
"SEW_MACHINE",
"SOLOMON_GATE",
"Triathlon_1_Start",
"Triathlon_2_Start",
"Triathlon_3_Start"

Sometimes used with IS_SCENARIO_GROUP_ENABLED:
if (TASK::DOES_SCENARIO_GROUP_EXIST("Observatory_Bikers") && (!TASK::IS_SCENARIO_GROUP_ENABLED("Observatory_Bikers"))) {
else if (TASK::IS_SCENARIO_GROUP_ENABLED("BLIMP")) {
